decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be implemented in accordance with drawing title number(s):

51AVG-ATG-00-00-DR-P-0020-230313-E.11.00 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); 51AVG-ATG-00-04-DR-P-0023-230313-E.11.04 (Existing Roof Plan); 51AVG-ATG-00-XX-DR-P-0009-230313-E.03.01 (Existing Sections Plan); 51AVG-ATG-00-00-DR-P-0025-230313-E.11.06 (Existing South Elevation Plan); 51AVG-ATG-00-00-DR-P-0024-230313-E.11.05 (Existing West Elevation); Design and Access Statement; 51AVG-ATG-03-00-DR-P-0032-230313-P3.03.00 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan);  51AVG-ATG-03-04-DR-P-0035-230313-P3.03.04 (Proposed Roof Plan); 51AVG-ATG-03-XX-DR-P-0038-230315-P3.11.08 (Proposed Side elevation);51AVG-ATG-03-XX-DR-P-0036-230315-P3.11.05 (Proposed Side elevation);51AVG-ATG-03-XX-DR-P-0037-230315-P3.11.06 (Proposed Side elevation); Site Block Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Conversion of the existing garage to a residential annex; single storey side/rear extension
